fields.name: Blackmail Day (x3):
fields.value: Use during the night. Pick a phrase of up to 10 words. Your target will be informed of this phrase, and during the next day phase, they must say this phrase and not rescind or comment back on it for the rest of that day. If the phrase includes the username of a player, they may not cast votes on players whose usernames are not in the phrase. If they failed, automatically attack them with 2.0x power during the next night phase.

fields.name: Blackmail Evening (x2):
fields.value: Use during the day. Pick a word of up to 4 letters. Your target must include that word in their response next evening. If they failed, their response will not appear in voting and they will automatically DNP.

fields.name: Blackmail Night (x1):
fields.value: Use during the day. Pick a word of up to 4 letters. Your target will be informed of this word and must include that word in their response next evening. If they failed, their response will not appear in voting and they will automatically DNP.
